title: Manage Special Event Access
description: A museum is hosting a members-only after-hours event. An agent at the door must verify membership for entry.

tasks.description: Ask the guest for their name or membership card.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the guest's identification information.

tasks.description: Look up the guest in the museum's membership database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the guest's profile and confirms they have an active membership.

tasks.description: Allow the member to enter the special event.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the member can proceed.
